thread.title: Marsh Road bridge opens after repairs
thread.title_full: Marsh Road bridge opens after repairs

author: democratandchronicle.com
title: Marsh Road bridge opens after repairs
text:
The Marsh Road bridge in Perinton is open after emergency repairs closed it September 23. An inspection had shown corrosion to bridge members that mean the structure could carry a maximum load of no more than three tons, Lori Maher, New York State Department of Transportation said. That signaled the need for immediate repairs, she said.
The bridge opened for traffic Thursday and will be able to handle a maximum load of seven tons, Maher said in a news release.
The single lane truss bridge was built in 1912 and carries Marsh Road over the Erie Canal between Route 31 and Route 96.
